DOC.brief_title: Improvement IVF Fertilization Rates , Cyclic Tripeptide FEE - Prospective Randomized Study
DOC.detailed_description: Name address coordinate investigator : Prof. Jean Philippe Wolf , Histology - Embryology Department , Biology Reproduction - . Cochin Hospital , 123 Bd Port Royal , 75014 Paris Promotor : AP- HP represent DRCD - Hôpital Saint- Louis Inclusion Sites : CHU Cochin , Paris Main objective : - To improve fertilization rate IVF supplementation culture medium molecule increase sperm fertilizing ability . Secondary objective - Compare rate cleavage two group zygotes - Compare percentage good quality embryos Number patient : 160 Duration inclusion period : 15 month Duration participation patient : For couple , duration participation many time nine month pregnancy obtain fresh frozen embryo transfers.In absence pregnancy duration participation 15 day . Time monitor child : 9 month Total study duration : The total study duration 36 month Rational : The cyclic tripeptide FEEc reproduce bind site Fertilin Beta . It bind alpha 6 beta 1 integrin increase sperm fertilize ability , improve movement 's parameter . Added insemination IVF medium , increase fertilization rate . Methodology : Oocytes cohort divide two group , one inseminate control medium group inseminate presence peptide . The fertilization rate embryo quality compare two group . Statistical analysis : In mouse healthy gamete , observed fertilization rate increase presence peptide 100 % . The fertilization rate human IVF 65 % , male indication include . There improvement fertilization index zona free human oocytes 90 % . We reasonably foresee improvement 15 % fertilization rate normal IVF . This believe difference fertilization rate treat control group must meaningful 160 attempt . In calculation assume intra cluster correlation ( ie intra cohort oocyte ) result 'design effect ' D equal 4 . The analysis include descriptive statistic quantitative parameter time : mean , standard deviation , minimum , maximum , median quartile , number miss value . Quality parameter express frequency distribution associate 95 % bilateral confidence intervals.The distribution number blastomere per embryo compare two group exact permutation test ( stratify ) . This method suitable `` naive '' comparison number , since take account possible correlation result embryos belong embryo cohort ( Gibbons JD 1985 Non parametric statistical inference - Marcel Dekker New York ) . The cellular index , pregnancy rate , spontaneous abortion , therapeutic abortion , childbirth , compare use Student 's test exact Fisher test . All test bilateral , look possible negative effect , set 5 % . Calculations perform use SAS statistical software v9.13 ( SAS Institute , Cary , NC ) supervision Professor Eric Vicaut URC Lariboisière St. Louis . Primary endpoint : Rate fertilization Expected Benefits : Improved fertilization rate least 15 %
